Judul: PREDICTION OF DIGGING FORCE USING ARTIFICIAL NEURAL NETWORK
Abstrak:
Excavators are commonly used to excavate materials. Excavation occurs when the force offered by the excavator
is greater than the force offered by the material. Tools that always receive high force from digging activity, will
be damaged faster. Therefore, we must calculate the forces acting on the tool. There are many ways that can be
used to calculate the number of digging forces, one of which is using analytics. In this study, the digging force will
be calculated by looking at the change in strain on the tool and predicting it using the Artificial Neural Network
(ANN) model. To determine the reaction to changes in strain and the load acting on the tool, vertical and horizontal
loading tests were carried out. This test is carried out to determine the change in strain when the load is given.
From the test results obtained, predictions using the ANN model have an R square of 92% for testing vertical loads
and 96% for testing horizontal loads.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Nurhindro Priagung Widodo, Tri Karian, Yudhidya Wicaksana and Taufiqullah
